name: ServiceInstance
description: Represents an instance of a service running on an executor

restartCount.description: The number of time the supervisor process for this instance was killed or has crashed and had to be restarted

PMPort.description: The API port the process manager is available on

containerVersionInfo.description: Information about the host, operating system, node version and container technology hosting this instance

setSize.description: The currently configured number of node processes that the instance should be running

applicationName.description: The application name that strong-agent uses to report its metrics

agentVersion.description: The version of strong-agent running on this instance

profileDatas.description: List of cpuprofile or heapdumps gathered for this service
